mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recruit ORDER BY id desc

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum-1 as no, r.* FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no_count, rt.* FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) tmp1, (SELECT * FROM recruit) rt WHERE id < 13 ORDER BY id desc) as r WHERE r.no_count > 0 AND r.no_count <= 10 AND (@rownum:=12)=12;
